articles.description: Policymakers want to get as many people vaccinated as possible. One idea that’s resurfaced involves allowing more time in between the first and second doses of the two-dose COVID-19 vaccines.
articles.content:
A debate on vaccination timelines is re-emerging
Healthcare workers wait for their first dose of the  first dose of the Pfizer/BioNTech vaccine in Bogata, Colombia. 
Photo by Juancho Torres/Anadolu… [+7473 chars]

articles.title: Tracking more snow next week | Weather | wfmz.com - 69News WFMZ-TV
articles.description: Some of us see all snow on Monday. Other spots see snow and rain. Find out who gets what in your updated forecast.
articles.content:

articles.author: Rich Duprey, USA TODAY
articles.title: Will Robinhood's IPO be GameStopped? At the height of the controversy the app was downloaded 600K times in one day - USA TODAY
articles.description: Many traders abandoned the app after it limited buying GameStop stock. According to one analyst, some 40% of those who left went to Square's Cash App.
articles.content: Investors waiting for the chance to buy shares of Robinhood, the online trading app that helped democratize stock investing by eliminating transaction fees, might have viewed the recent GameStop dram… [+5463 chars]
